name: The Brimstone Journey (Demo)
description:
Controls:

A,D - Walk

Space - Jump

LMB - Shoot normally, RMB - Shoot a laser

This game is about a robot, which was made in a hidden room of a deep dark facility that specializes on making war technology and robots/creatures. Your main mission is to destroy this facility's creator and stop it's functioning. but is the facility actually causing problems in the overworld? This is a demo and this question can't be given an answer to. 

I really appreciate the gamejam and the opportunity to participate in it, at least this time i didn't waste too much time on nothing, gl to everybody!!
